question: Ikindi kinyabiziga kiguturutse inyuma kiguterera amatara y'urumuri rumyasa,  wakora iki?
answers: Fata feri y'urugendo kugira ngo umwereke ko ugiye guhagarara
Kongera umuvuduko kugira ngo intera iri hagati yawe n'ukuri inyuma igumeho
Emerera icyo kinyabiziga kugutambukaho niba imbere ntacyago gihari

question: Birabujijwe kubangamira imigendere isanzwe y'ibindi binyabiziga kubera ibi bikurikira:
answers: gukacira feri bidatewe no kwirinda ibyago
kugabanya umuvuduko kuburyo budasanzwe no gukacira feri bidatewe no kwirinda ibyago

question: Iki cyapa gisobanura iki?
answers: Gutanga umwanya ku bindi binyabiziga i buryo bwawe

question: Iki cyapa gisobanura iki mu nkomane?
answers: Tanga inzira ku binyabiziga bigenda mu muhanda munini wegera
Tanga inzira ku ibinyabiziga biturutse iburyo bwawe

question: Ibyapa byerekana icyago kidahoraho kandi bigenewe kwerekana aho bagana cyangwa aho berekeza  umuhanda nk'igihe cy'impanuka cyangwa hari imirimo ikorwa mu muhanda birangwa n'amabara akurikira:

Ubugari bw'imizigo yikorewe n'ipikipiki ifite akanyabiziga ko kuruhande kimwe n'ubwa romoruki ikuruwe na bene icyo kinyabiziga ntibushobora kurenza ibipimo bikurikira ku bugari bw'icyo kinyabiziga kidapakiye:
Mbere yo kunyura ku kindi kinyabiziga, ni ngombwa kumenya ko:
answers: Umuhanda ubona neza, no kwitondera kunyuranaho
Ikinyabiziga kinturutse imbere gishaka gukatira I buumoso

question: Nijoro igihe ijuru rikeye, itara ribonesha icyapa kiranga numero y'ikinyabiziga rigomba gutuma izo numero zisomerwa nibura mu ntera ikurikira:
Niki wakora mbere y'uko uhindura icyerekezo?
answers: Gutanga ikimenyetso cy'ukuboko no gukoresha amatara ndangacyerekezo.
Itegereze neza niba icyapa kikwemerera guhindura icyerekezo.
Ibisubizo bibanza hejuru byose ni ukuri

question: Ndashaka gupariki ikinyabiziga iburyo kunzira y'abanyamaguru
Urebeye kuri ibi byapa habujijwe :
answers: Kunyuranaho kubinyabiziga bikururwa nibinyabiziga birengeje imitende ibiri ibumoso no kugendera kumuvuduko urengeje 70 km/h
Kunyuranaho kubinyabiziga bikururwa cyangwa ibinyabiziga birengeje imitende ibiri ibumoso

question: Buri modoka cyangwa buri romoruki ikuruwe n'iyo modoka bishobora kugira itara risa n'icyatsi kibisi bituma umuyobozi yerekana ko yabonye ikimenyetso cy'uwitegura kumunyuraho. Iryo tara rigomba gushyirwa aha hakurikira:

Iyo kuva bwije kugeza bukeye cyangwa bitewe n'uko ibihe bimeze bitagishoboka kubona neza muri m 200, mu nzira nyabagendwa, romoruki iziritse kuri velomoteri cyangwa ipikipiki idafite akanyabiziga ku ruhande, uretse velomoteri idafite umuyobozi, kandi uburumbarare bwayo, cyangwa bw'ibyo yikoreye bukaba butuma itara ry'ikinyabiziga biyikurura ritagaragara, iyo romoruki igaragazwa ku buryo bukurikira:
answers: itara ryera riri kuri romoruki inyuma
itara ry'umuhondo riri kuri romoruki inyuma
itara risa n'icunga riri kuri romoruki inyuma

question: Amatara y'urugendo, mu gihe cy'ibihu:
answers: Ni mabi kuko arakugarukira akaguhuma amaso
Ni meza kuko atuma ureba kure

question: Mu gihe Umuntu ufite ubumuga bwo kutabona yambuka umuhanda yitwaje inkoni yera y'abatabona:
answers: Umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga agomba gufata iyo  nkoni nk'icyapa kimumenyesha ko agomba guhagarara

question: Telephone ngendanwa ntigomba gukoreshwa:
answers: Igihe utwaye ikinyabiziga Ku muvuduko wa 20km/h

question: Gutwara uzungazunga mu muhanda:
answers: Ni bibi ku kinyabiziga cy'imitende ibiri
Ni bibi ku kinyabiziga cy'imitende ine

question: Ibinyabiziga bifite ubugari bufite ibipimo bikurikira bigomba kugira amatara ndangaburumbarare
Mu gihe telefone yawe ihamagawe utwaye imodoka   wakora iki?
Amatara maremare y'ikinyabiziga agomba kuzimwa mu bihe bikurikira:
answers: iyo ikinyabiziga gikurikiye mu ntambwe zitagera muri m100 keretse iyo umuyobozi wacyo ashaka kunyura kucyo akurikiye acana azimya vuba vuba amatara maremare
iyo umuhanda umurikiwe hose kandi umuyobozi ashobora kubona nibura mu ntera ingana na metero 200
